title: Ultraviolet Restrains Marine Biofouling of Uranium Extraction from Seawater
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00731J, Paper
Dadong Shao, Qianhong Gao, Meng Yan
Marine biofouling seriously limits uranium (U(VI)) extraction from seawater, which is fairly related to the survival and reproduction of marine microorganisms. In this work, the complex and varied effect of...
